Data Fields

rlContModeCfg_t cfg
 Continuous mode configuration.
 
uint16_t dataTransSize
 Sample count: This refers to the number of samples per channel.
 

Detailed Description

Continuous mode configuration.

The structure specifies the configuration which is required to configure the mmWave link to operate in continuous mode
